problem_text:
15.59. Does there exist a profinite group G that is not free but can be represented as a projective limit G = lim←−(G/Nα), where all the G/Nα are free profinite groups of finite ranks?
The finiteness condition on the ranks of the G/Nα is essential. Such a group G cannot satisfy the first axiom of countability (O. V. Mel’nikov, Dokl. AN BSSR, 24, no. 11 (1980), 968–970 (Russian)). O. V. Mel’nikov
